title: Quantum Group Schr\"{o}dinger Field Theory
abstract: We show that a quantum deformation of quantum mechanics given in a previous work is equivalent to quantum mechanics on a nonlinear lattice with step size $\Delta x=~(1-q)x$. Then, based on this, we develop the basic formalism of quantum group Schr\"{o}dinger field theory in one spatial quantum dimension, and explicitly exhibit the $SU_{q}(2)$ covariant algebras satisfied by the $q$-bosonic and $q$-fermionic Schr\"{o}dinger fields. We generalize this result to an arbitrary number of fields.
